content: Projects  RoboRTS : an open source software stack for Real-Time Strategy research on mobile robots. Whole project is based on ROS and open sourced  RoboMaster S1/EP : a game-changing educational robot built to unlock the potential in every learner. The robot is supported to program using Scratch and Python
